SEARCH
Package reader

Klasse SimplePath

java.lang.Object
reader.SimplePath
public class SimplePath extends Object
Represents a path in a GFA file, which consists of a sequence of segments with orientations. Provides methods to access path attributes, segment names, and their positions within the path.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Constructs a SimplePath object from a line in a GFA file.

    Constructs a SimplePath object with a given name and segment array.

    • SimplePath

      public SimplePath(String line)
      Constructs a SimplePath object from a line in a GFA file.
      Parameter:
      line - the GFA file line containing path information

    • SimplePath

      public SimplePath(String name, String[] segmentNamesWithOrientation)
      Constructs a SimplePath object with a given name and segment array.
      Parameter:
      name - the name of the path
      segmentNamesWithOrientation - an array of segment names with orientations

  • Methodendetails

    • checkIfSegmentIsReverse

      public static boolean checkIfSegmentIsReverse(String segment)
      Checks if a given segment has reverse orientation.
      Parameter:
      segment - the segment string (e.g., "1+")
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the segment is reverse-oriented (ends with '-'), false otherwise

    • checkIfSegmentAtIsReverse

      public boolean checkIfSegmentAtIsReverse(int index)
      Checks if the segment in the i-th step is revers.
      Parameter:
      index - the index of the segment on the path
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the segment is reverse-oriented (ends with '-'), false otherwise

    • getSegmentName

      public static String getSegmentName(String segment)
      Extracts the name of a segment without its orientation.
      Parameter:
      segment - the segment string (e.g., "A+")
      Gibt zurück:
      the segment name without orientation (e.g., "A")

    • getPathName

      public String getPathName()
      Gets the name of the path.
      Gibt zurück:
      the name of the path

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Gets the number of segments in the path.
      Gibt zurück:
      the number of segments in the path

    • getSegmentToPositions

      public HashMap<String,ArrayList<Integer>> getSegmentToPositions()
      Maps each segment name (with orientation) to a list of positions where it appears in the path.
      Gibt zurück:
      a map of segment names to their positions

    • getSegmentWithOrientationAt

      public String getSegmentWithOrientationAt(int index)
      Retrieves the segment name (with orientation) at a specific position in the path.
      Parameter:
      index - the index in the path
      Gibt zurück:
      the segment name with orientation at the specified index
